title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, April 22, 2021
description: “Writing is a kind of revenge against circumstance too: bad luck, loss, pain. If you make something out of it, then you’ve no longer been bested by these events.”-- Louise Glück (1943
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
